splits.name: Commerce Bancshares, Inc.
splits.notes: 5% stock dividend (1.05-for-1). Board declared Oct 31, 2025. Record date Dec 2, 2025. Distributed Dec 16, 2025. 57th consecutive year of dividend increases.

splits.name: FitLife Brands, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved 2-for-1 forward split. Certificate of Change filed with Nevada Secretary of State effective Feb 6, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Feb 7, 2025. Shares outstanding doubled from 4,605,108 to 9,210,216.

splits.name: Coca-Cola Consolidated, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Mar 4, 2025. Stockholders approved May 13, 2025. Record date May 16, 2025. Distributed May 23, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began May 27, 2025. Applies to both Common Stock and Class B Common Stock.

splits.name: Fastenal Company
splits.notes: Board approved Apr 23, 2025. Record date May 5, 2025. Effective after close May 21, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began May 22, 2025. SEC 8-K: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/815556/000081555625000085/fast-20250423.htm

splits.name: Interactive Brokers Group, Inc.
splits.notes: Announced alongside Q1 2025 earnings on Apr 15, 2025. Record date Jun 16, 2025. Three additional shares distributed after close Jun 17, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 18, 2025. First split since 2007 IPO.

splits.name: Netflix, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Oct 30, 2025. Record date Nov 10, 2025. Nine additional shares distributed after close Nov 14, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Nov 17, 2025. SEC 8-K: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1065280/000106528025000450/nflx-20251114.htm

splits.name: ServiceNow, Inc.
splits.notes: Board authorized with Q3 2025 results. Shareholders approved at special meeting Dec 5, 2025 (182M for, 61K against). Record date Dec 16, 2025. Effective at 4:05pm ET Dec 17, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Dec 18, 2025. First split in company history.

splits.name: Orange County Bancorp, Inc.
splits.notes: Board declared 2-for-1 forward split. Record date Jan 8, 2025 (adjusted from Jan 9 due to markets closing for President Carter). Effective after close Jan 10, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Jan 13, 2025. Shares doubled from ~5.7M to ~11.4M.

splits.name: O'Reilly Automotive, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Mar 13, 2025. Shareholders approved May 15, 2025. Record date Jun 2, 2025. 14 additional shares distributed after close Jun 9, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 10, 2025. SEC 8-K: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/898173/000089817325000033/orly-20250515x8k.htm

splits.name: RLI Corp.
splits.notes: Board announced Nov 7, 2024. Record date Dec 31, 2024. Shares distributed Jan 15, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Jan 16, 2025.

splits.name: Yoshiharu Global Co.
splits.notes: Board approved 4-for-1 forward split. Record date Jul 28, 2025. Three additional shares distributed after close Jul 30, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Jul 31, 2025.

splits.name: Texas Pacific Land Corporation
splits.notes: Announced Nov 5, 2025. Record date Dec 12, 2025. Two additional shares distributed Dec 22, 2025. Split-adjusted trading began Dec 23, 2025. SEC 8-K: https://www.texaspacific.com/investors/sec-filings/all-sec-filings/content/0001104659-25-117726/0001104659-25-117726.pdf
